Springfield.Ethel Apartment House: The Ethel Apartment House is a historic apartment building at 70 Patton Street in the North End of Springfield, Massachusetts. The four story red brick building was built in 1912 for Jacob Blisky, a successful local retailer, at a cost of $14,000. It was designed by Burton Gechler, a local architect who designed a number of other apartment blocks during the 1910s.
